# ExploreGUI Installer for Windows

This page provides instructions for creating an installer for Windows 10.

## Dependencies
- Python 3.8.12 and a virtual environment
- [PyInstaller](https://github.com/pyinstaller/pyinstaller) with `pip install pyinstaller==4.7` inside a the virtual environment.
- [Inno Setup software](https://jrsoftware.org/isdl.php) (version 6.2.0)


## How to

- In a terminal activate the virtual environment and navigate to ExploreGUI folder
- Install ExploreGUI using `pip install -e .`
- Run `pyinstaller --onedir --console --icon=mentalab ExploreGUI.spec`

This should create a directory named `ExploreGUI` in the `dist` folder. You can run the `ExploreGUI.exe` file to make sure the software works as intended.

- Next, open Inno Setup software and open `setup-builder.iss` script with the software.
- Run the the compiler (click on the icon or press F9).
- The installer file should be in the `installer/Windows/output` directory.
